messages.content: Are you happy with the way things are in Britain today?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A plan to not tax the first £10,000 you earn, aiming to help millions of low earners and pensioners pay no tax at all, with the projection that those who earn over £10,000 will get an extra £700 in their pockets.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Remember in many parts of Britain, the Conservatives simply can't win. The choice is between real change with the Liberal Democrats or no change with Labour.

issues.economy: Bankers picking up huge bonuses, credit crunch and bank bail-outs, scandal of MPs' expenses.

images.caption: Nick Clegg, Leader of the Liberal Democrats
